Podcasts & Players is a podcast that aims to entertain with stories and tips for roleplaying games like D&D, as well as to promote content creators who love playing them. 

Each episode begins with a general interview about the guest, and then we segue into nerdy topics like character creation, stories from our D&D and Pathfinder games, numbers and game mechanics, tips for dungeon masters and story tellers, setting expectations, world building, running combats, our favorite classes and homebrew, and much, much more!

title: The Esports Report
description:
The Esports Report is a podcast focusing on American High School Esports programs. The hosts, Ashley Hodge and Wil Nix, both started as Season 0 Esports coaches through the PlayVS Georgia Esports program. Wil Nix has experienced significant success with his program by winning the Georgia State Championship for Rocket League, and he serves on the GHSA Esports Board of Advisors. Ashley Hodge serves as a PlayVS Supercoach, A member of the GHSA Esports Board of Advisors, and a member of Riot’s Scholastic Association of America. She has created two successful esports programs in Georgia. Additionally, she is currently working on a esports dissertation. 


The goal of this podcast is to educate admins, students, parents, schools, and society about esports in American high schools. Topics include the following: a history of esports in GA, how to start a program, how to fund a program, how to coach, how to manage social media accounts, how to grow your program, and much more. Furthermore, several interviews with GHSA, PlayVS, coaches, students, and players are planned for future episodes. 

Please engage with us by leaving comments on the Youtube episodes, rating and reviewing us on Apple Podcast, and emailing us at theesportsreporths@gmail.com 

If you are a business or potential sponsor, we would love to do promotions for you. Your contribution will help cover the cost of editing software used and other expenses to make this show possible. Please contact us for ad rates at our email listed above. 

We hope you enjoy the show!

We know that you had several options you could have picked from to listen to, but since you decided to land on our show, you're our heroes. Thank you!

title: Dusk//Dawn
description:
Josh and Alex (whose internet pseudonyms are Karif_Wins and dRafterDemon respectively) have been drafting Magic: The Gathering for many years now, listening to other podcasts and gaining skills through osmosis. Now, they want to improve their skills by creating a podcast that deep dives weekly into competitive Limited gameplay while also acknowledging the hilarity of the MTG grind. 

Dusk//Dawn is a conversational podcast which leverages both Josh and Alex's obsessions to continually explore the inner workings of modern limited Magic. As a secondary goal, it's also self-aware of the fact that the hosts still don't have perfect knowledge of how to play the game. Strategy, commentary, game design criticisms, bad heuristics, and comedy are all fair game while talking. For those obsessed with Magic commentary like Josh and Alex, Dusk//Dawn is the chaser for the more analytical and technical Magic podcasts about Limited.

Explicit Content -- Swearing
Intro and outro song courtesy of the Free Music Archive

title: A Pint Of Cthulhu
description:
Hello and welcome to A Pint Of Cthulhu We are a group of six friends from various corners of the world - two Americans, two Scottish, and two English - and we love nothing more than playing tabletop role-playing games (TTRPGs) together.

But this is not your typical TTRPG experiment, serious and compliant with the rules. Oh no. Our sessions are filled with laughter, jokes and plenty of messing about. We don't get too serious, and we're not afraid to get drunk every once in a while.

Each season, we'll be taking you on a journey through a different TTRPG. From Dungeons & Dragons to Call of Cthulhu and many more each season, we're always up for trying something new. And along the way, we'll be sharing our thoughts, experiences, and of course, plenty of laughs.

So sit down, chill out, and join us for a little TTRPG fun. You never know what will happen, but one thing is for sure - it's always a great time with our group.

This podcast contains adult language and themes

title: TÉALK PODCAST
description:
¡Hola y bienvenidos a "Téalk Podcast"! Soy tu anfitrión, Ramirez, y te invito a unirte a este podcast lleno de entrevistas interesantes, noticias emocionantes y vibrantes conversaciones.

En cada episodio, nos sumergiremos en conversaciones fascinantes con personas de diversas áreas, desde artistas y creadores hasta expertos en la industria de los videojuegos. Descubriremos sus historias inspiradoras, exploraremos sus experiencias y aprenderemos de sus conocimientos únicos.

Además, no solo nos enfocaremos en las entrevistas, sino que también estaremos al tanto de las últimas noticias y tendencias del mundo de los videojuegos, entre otras. Compartiremos nuestras opiniones, análisis y recomendaciones para mantenerte actualizado y emocionado sobre los lanzamientos más esperados, las innovaciones tecnológicas y todo lo que rodea a esta apasionante industria.

Así que prepárate para sumergirte en un universo de historias cautivadoras, descubrimientos asombrosos y debates apasionantes.

¡No te lo pierdas! ¡Sintoniza cada episodio y únete a nosotros en este emocionante viaje a través del mundo de las entrevistas, las noticias y los videojuegos!

title: Did You Play? Gaming Podcast
description: Well, here you are. Searching for a podcast that can bring back those joyous memories from your favourite games as a kid. Heck, maybe even as an adult. If you were a Nintendo household who played anything Mario but wouldn't touch anything else or a Call of Duty kid whose times on Multiplayer and Zombies were the best gaming years you had, or maybe you just wanted to learn and hear about my experiences playing these games with my friends. Either way, all you gaming geeks, nerds, kings and queens this is a safe and friendly place to hear us rant, rave and moan about the games that we grew up with and that shaped us. As dedicated, passionate fans we want to build a community of like-minded, thoughtful gamers who love to talk about games as much as we do and appreciate gaming in the same way.

title: Piped Up
description:
Welcome to the Piped Up Podcast, the show that explores the intersection of cars, business, and gaming. In this podcast, we dive deep into the world of cars and how they are changing the way we live, work, and play. We talk about the latest trends in the automotive industry, from electric and autonomous vehicles to cutting-edge design and customization.

But that's not all. We also discuss the business side of the automotive industry, from the strategies of major car manufacturers to the latest developments in the aftermarket parts and accessories market. And we can't forget about gaming – we explore how video games are changing the way we experience cars, from the most realistic racing simulators to the most innovative car-themed games.

Whether you're a car enthusiast, a business leader, a gamer, or just someone interested in the cutting edge of technology, Piped Up has something for you. Join us each week as we explore the fascinating world of cars, business, and gaming – and how they are shaping the future of our world.

title: 2 Dudes Spittin'
description:
"2 Dudes Spittin'" is a unique and experimental podcast that features OhKolbi, a video game developer, and NeatNeet, a music composer and YouTuber. The show takes a meta approach to commentary and interviews, where nothing is planned beforehand. Instead, the hosts engage in spontaneous conversations that explore a wide range of topics related to their fields of expertise and beyond.

Listeners can expect a casual and authentic atmosphere on "2 Dudes Spittin'", as the hosts bring their distinct personalities and perspectives to the table. From discussing the latest trends in the gaming and music industries to sharing personal stories and opinions, Kolbi and NeatNeet provide a raw and unfiltered look into their worlds.

The podcast's format is intentionally loose, allowing the hosts to explore tangents and delve into unexpected topics. This results in a dynamic listening experience that keeps listeners engaged and entertained.

XP Esports Talk është një podcast për gaming dhe esports, krijuar nga XPortalEsports për Radio Urban FM.

Në këtë podcast, do të të sjellim lajmet më të reja në botën e gaming-ut, duke fokusuar veçanërisht në ekipet tona të lojërave të preferuara. Bashkë me mysafirët tanë të veçantë, do të diskutojmë sfidat dhe sukseset e industrisë së esports.

Nëpërmjet podcast-it, do të shpalosim pasionin tonë për gaming dhe do të përcjellim histori interesante nga XPortal.

Ky podcast transmetohet live çdo të enjte nga ora 21:00 deri në 22:00 në Urban FM 103.5 dhe 105.5 FM.

Gjithashtu, mund ta gjeni në të gjitha platformat e Urban FM online.

title: بودكاستك
description:
برنامج بودكاستك عبارة عن سلسلة حلقات صوتية في مجال التكنولوجيا والألعاب. يستضيف البرنامج مضيفين .يتحدثون عن أحدث التطورات التكنولوجية وأخبار الألعاب

يهدف البرنامج إلى تقديم تغطية شاملة لمجال التكنولوجيا والألعاب، وقد يركز على مواضيع محددة مثل الهواتف الذكية، الذكاء الاصطناعي، التقنيات الحديثة، أجهزة الألعاب، ألعاب الفيديو، والواقع الافتراضي، وغيرها. يمكن أن يتضمن البرنامج مقابلات مع خبراء التكنولوجيا واللاعبين المحترفين، ونقاشات عامة حول الألعاب الجديدة والتقنيات الناشئة، .واستعراض للمنتجات والأجهزة الجديدة، ونصائح وإرشادات للمستخدمين

عمومًا، يقدم برنامج بودكاستك محتوى ممتع وتثقيفي للمهتمين بهذا المجال، بطابع عفوي وممتع للمستمعين.

title: ATMO Interview With David Luong (Senior VFX Environment Artist/Matte Painter)
description:
Join ATMO as we hang out with David Luong, a veteran senior environment artist and matte painter. We'll learn about how he got started in the industry and take a look at some of his incredible work from his time at Blizzard, which you can find on our website (www.atmovfx.com). David will share some of the challenges he's faced throughout his career, as well as his strategies for success. David served as a cinematic artist at Blizzard Entertainment for 15 years working on titles such as World of Warcraft, Overwatch, Diablo, StarCraft 2, Hearthstone and Heroes of the Storm. He brings over 17 years of film & games industry experience with deep knowledge in lighting, compositing and digital matte painting. David is also known as “Eleven” at Imagendary Studios and is currently the Lead Digimatte artist for the studio. He is an enthusiastic mentor and educator in digital matte painting through the online community and co-authored the book d’Artiste: Matte Painting Vol. 3 Signup on our site and share your work! If you're a senior, we'd love to interview you! So upload your work so we can find you. :)

Website: www.atmovfx.com

Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/atmovfx_off...

Linkedin: https://www.linkedin.com/company/atmo...

Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/ATMOVFX

title: NFG
description:
Introducing 'NFG - Network for Gamers', your digital hub for the vibrant world of gaming. This podcast serves as a central gathering place for gamers of all kinds, offering a diverse range of content that goes beyond mere news updates. Get ready to immerse yourself in the thrilling realm of gaming as we explore reviews, gaming conventions, breakthrough titles, and the latest trends that shape the industry.

Embark on an exhilarating quest with each episode of 'NFG - Network for Gamers', where we navigate the ever-changing landscape of gaming. Uncover the most significant announcements, dissect intriguing stories, and stay up-to-date with next-gen console news and exciting developments in VR and indie games. From AAA blockbusters to thrilling eSports championships, we've got your gaming adventure covered from every angle.

Beyond being just a news outlet, 'NFG - Network for Gamers' delves into the profound impact of gaming trends on the industry and beyond. Engaging discussions explore how gaming intersects with technology, culture, and society. We proudly host esteemed guests, including game developers, industry analysts, and professional gamers, who share their invaluable insights and perspectives.

Plug into 'NFG - Network for Gamers', and let the gaming universe come alive through your headphones or speakers. Whether you're a devoted player, a game developer, or an enthusiast captivated by gaming culture, this is your destination for all things gaming. Join our community of passionate gamers, and together, let's unlock the endless possibilities of the gaming world.

Each episode dives into the realms of gaming and esports, bringing you exclusive interviews with both rising stars and seasoned veterans, coaches, insightful commentators and industry leaders.

So whether you're an aspiring pro gamer, a dedicated fan, or simply curious about the inner workings of gaming and esports, grab your headset, and join us on this thrilling adventure through the virtual arenas, where victory, comradery, and endless adventure await.

Game on!

title: ProGamer
description: Los videojuegos son más que un simple pasatiempo; es un mundo dinámico e inmersivo donde los jugadores se convierten en héroes, estrategas y exploradores. En este reino digital, la creatividad no conoce límites y las aventuras virtuales esperan en cada esquina. Ya sea combatiendo criaturas míticas en épicas RPGs, poniendo a prueba tus reflejos en emocionantes shooters o resolviendo intrincados rompecabezas en aventuras que desafían tu mente, los videojuegos ofrecen una escapada hacia la imaginación sin límites. Es una comunidad diversa donde se forjan amistades, las competiciones son intensas

Welcome to "CRAM KAST," the podcast that CRAMs you into an exhilarating journey through the captivating world of gaming and streaming. Whether you're a seasoned gamer, an aspiring content creator, or just someone curious about the Nation of CRAM, sit back and enjoy the show!
